title: A note on Diagonal sequences of integer partitions
abstract:
Let \(\mathcal{P}(n)\) be the set of partitions of the positive integer
\(n\). For \(\alpha=(\alpha_1,...,\alpha_t) \in \mathcal{P}(n)\) define the
diagonal sequence \(\delta(\alpha)=(d_k(\alpha))_{k \geq 1}\) via \(
d_k(\alpha) = \big\lvert \{ i \, \rvert \, 1 \leq i \leq k \mbox{ and }
\alpha_i + i- 1\geq k \} \big\rvert.\) We show that the set of all partitions
in \(\mathcal{P}(n)\) with the same diagonal sequence is a partially ordered
set under majorization with unique maximal and minimal elements and we give an
explicit formula for the number of partitions with the same diagonal sequence.
